translations: v.用力丢下或放下；重重地坐下；费力（或蹩脚地）演奏乐器
n.（重物落下）砰地一声；廉价劣质酒

phrs.translation: 便宜的酒, 劣质酒, 使劲投掷, 英

sentences.sentence: She sat down with a plonk.
Give the i-Plonk a nice waterproof cover.
sentences.translation: 给i - Plonk(讽刺)一个好看的防水套。

sentences.sentence: True, it will lift the guilt off your shoulders, but it will plonk a whole heap of pain on your partner’s.
sentences.translation: 诚然，这会把你肩头的内疚卸掉，但是却会给伴侣造成击打的痛苦。
